title: Northern lights may be visible in 10 states tonight as Earth's magnetic field 'rings like a bell' after CME impact
description: Auroras may be visible from Alaska to Maine tonight as Earth reels from a colossal CME impact.
content: Auroras may be visible from Alaska to Maine tonight as Earth reels from a colossal CME impact.
